seo.title: Limoncello i lokalna kuchnia
seo.description: Przegląd lokalnych smaków: limoncello, specjały z cytryn i gdzie je spróbować.

sections.title: Tasting
body: Pair tastings with lemon gelato, sorbet, or pastries to gauge sweetness and balance.

sections.title: Buying & shipping
body: Check airline liquid limits; pack bottles securely in checked luggage.

sections.title: Cooking with lemons
body: Store lemons in a cool, dark spot and repurpose peels for syrups or marinades.

tips: Skip overpriced souvenir shops near the main beach; head a street or two back for better value.

faqs.q: Can I carry limoncello in hand luggage?
